description.narrative: By end 2017, school readiness standards including child-friendly measurement tools, pre-primary curriculum, and pre-services/in- service programmes for pre-school, primary and secondary school specialists are updated in line with international quality and inclusive education standards., which contributes to Early Learning, Learning Outcomes, Learning Outcomes (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Quality and Inclusive Early Learning:By end-2020, young children aged 3-8, including the most disadvantaged, benefit from preschool and primary education

sector.narrative: System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget

title.narrative: Republic of Turkmenistan Country Programme Action Plan
Republic of Turkmenistan United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Programmes in Turkmenisan (Quality and Inclusive Early Learning )
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end 2017, school readiness standards including child-friendly measurement tools, pre-primary curriculum, and pre-services/in- service programmes for pre-school, primary and secondary school specialists are updated in line with international quality and inclusive education standards.

description.narrative: The implementation of the operational plan in one of the velayats did not start as planned. However, the MoE developed and submitted to the Government a proposal on improving access to and quality of pre-school education. Once the proposal is adopted, the MoE is expected to initiate state-funded nation-wide implementation in line with the SDG target 4.2. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: c2a. Early learning policy and early learning programme including quality early learning curriculum and standards - score (1-4), see guidance

baseline.value: 1.5 - The Early Learning Development Standards are available but do not include indicators to measure the progress of child development. The early learning curriculum does not include child-friendly measurement tools to ensure school readiness in line with international standards

target.value: 2020:2.5 - Early readiness checklist is used as a quality observation and education departments nation-wide in all 5 velayats and Ashgabat city receive data on child development and learning in line with the early readiness checklist.

actual.value: 2019:2.5 – Education departments from all 5 provinces reported that all pre-school professionals per province receive annual training on the use of early readiness checklist. However, data on the extent of the use and actual progress of the child in line with the check list criteria is not available.

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Early learning - Existence of national policy, leadership and budget for early learning - score (1-4), see guidance

baseline.value: 3 - Provision of pre-primary education nation-wide is mandated; current coverage is 46% with regional disparities in access to and quality of pre-primary preparation, budget allocation is inadequate. The draft National ECD Strategy for 2018-2024 is available.

target.value: 2020:3 - The MoE (as the institutional anchor) starts the implementation of selected elements of the policy on ensuring universal and free pre-primary education (as stated in the National Plan and ECD Strategy) for all children and informed by the costing options identified in the 2018 operational plan.

actual.value: 2019:3 - A round table on initiation of the operational plan for introduction of 1-year pre-primary education was held in June with representatives of the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Finance and Economy as well as velayat-level education departments.
